alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nuckolls County through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bostwick, or 35 miles northwest of Belleville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Superior around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ruskin and Nora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
